summary: Providing for the submission to the qualified electors (voters) of the City of Seattle at the general municipal election to be held therein on November 6, 1973 of the initiative measure contemplated by voters' petition (C.F. 276535) relating to the sale, use and distribution of marijuana and providing for possession and distribution of marijuana and providing for possession and distribution thereof without penalty; providing for certification of such initiative measure to the Director of the Dept. of Records and Elections of King County and prescribing the ballot title therefor.
